subject: RE: [junit] Integration Testing Framework.
msgSnippet: Hello , Yu can use JUnit for integration testing as well. All you need to do is to consider the integrated systems as a unit and call the interface or
messageBody:
Hello ,

Yu can use JUnit for integration testing as well. All you need to do is to
consider the integrated systems as a unit and call the interface or
interacting methods to check their functionality.

Is there any particular functionality you are looking for in the Integration
Testing Framework ?

Regards,

Sachin

-----Original Message-----
From: selena su [mailto:selena.su@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 10:03 AM
Cc: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Integration Testing Framework.


Hi There:
Is there any Integration framework for JAVA available in the industry ?

Thanks,
